observation.indicationText: Administer to persons seeking protection.
Administer to persons who are undergoing elective splenectomy if they have not previously received the vaccine.
observation.clarifyingText: Vaccination 14 or more days before splenectomy is suggested

observation.observationTitle: Recipient of a hematopoietic stem cell transplant
observation.indicationText: Administer to recipients of a hematopoietic stem cell transplant [HSCT] 6 to 12 months after a successful transplant, regardless of vaccination history.
Administer to persons with a hepatitis C virus infection.
Administer to persons who receive clotting factor concentrates.
Administer to women who are pregnant.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is pregnant.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to an area of active cholera transmission
observation.indicationText: Administer to adult travelers (aged 18-64 years) from the United States traveling to an area of active cholera transmission.
observation.clarifyingText: An area of active cholera transmission is defined as a province, state, or other administrative subdivision within a country with endemic or epidemic cholera caused by toxigenic V. cholerae O1 and includes areas with cholera activity within the last year that are prone to recurrence of cholera epidemics; it does not include areas where only rare imported or sporadic cases have been reported.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is breastfeeding.

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have cerebrospinal fluid leaks.
Administer to persons who have cochlear implants.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has a family history of altered immunocompetence
observation.clarifyingText: Harmonizes with the vaccine-specific statements in accommodating infants and toddlers with occult heritable congenital immunodeficiencies.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has Severe Combined Immunodeficiency [SCID].

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have diabetes.
Administer to persons who have chronic liver disease.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes cirrhosis

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have chronic heart disease.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g. congestive heart failure and cardiomyopathies, excluding hypertension

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have chronic lung disease.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g. chronic obstructive lung disease, emphysema but not asthma

observation.observationTitle: Laboratory Evidence of Immunity or confirmation of Hepatitis A disease
Laboratory Evidence of Immunity or confirmation of Hepatitis B disease
Laboratory Evidence of Immunity for Measles
Laboratory Evidence of Immunity for Mumps
Laboratory Evidence of Immunity for Rubella
Laboratory Evidence of Immunity or confirmation of Varicella disease
Healthcare provider verified history of or diagnosis of Varicella
Healthcare provider verified history or diagnosis of Herpes Zoster
Persons with perinatal HIV infection who do not have evidence of severe immunosuppression and who were vaccinated with MMR before establishment of antiviral therapy [ART]
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons with perinatal HIV infection who do not have evidence of severe immunosuppression and who were vaccinated with MMR before establishment of antiviral therapy [ART].
Administer to persons who have asthma.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has asthma.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has intussusception.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes history of uncorrected congenital malformation of the gastrointestinal tract that would predispose the infant to intussusception or history of intussusception.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has acute gastroenteritis.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has acute febrile illness.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has active untreated tuberculosis.

observation.indicationText: Administer to hemodialysis patients and predialysis, peritoneal dialysis, and home dialysis patients

observation.observationTitle: Taken influenza antiviral medications within the previous 48 hours
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has taken influenza antiviral medications  within the previous 48 hours.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g. amantadine, rimantadine, zanamivir, or oseltamivir

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is receiving long-term aspirin therapy.

observation.observationTitle: Antimicrobial or antimalarial taken within 72 hours
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient  has taken antimicrobial or antimalarial medications  within the previous 72 hours.
observation.clarifyingText: A longer interval should be considered for long-acting antimicrobials [e.g., the antimalarial agents mefloquine and chloroquine and the combinations atovaquone/proguanil and pyrimethamine/sulfadoxine can, at doses used for prophylaxis, be administered together with the Ty21a vaccine; however, the manufacturer advises that other antimalarial agents only be administered at least 3 days after the last vaccine dose).

observation.observationTitle: Men who have sex with men
observation.indicationText: Administer to men who have sex with men.

observation.observationTitle: Not in a long-term, mutually monogamous relationship
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons not in a long-term, mutually monogamous relationship.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g. persons with more than 1 sex partner during the previous 6 months

observation.observationTitle: Sex partner of Hepatitis B surface antigen-positive persons
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are a sex partner of a Hepatitis B surface antigen-positive person.
Administer to persons who receive treatment for STD.

codedValue.text: Under care of genitourinary medicine physician [finding]

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who use illicit drugs.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes injection and noninjection illicit drugs

codedValue.text: Finding relating to drug misuse behavior [finding]

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who use illicit injection drugs.
Administer to persons who smoke cigarettes.
Administer to persons who have alcoholism.

observation.observationTitle: Close contact with international adoptee during first 60 days
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who will have close contact with an international adoptee during the first 60 days.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., household or regular babysitting\nApplies when adoptee is from a country with high or intermediate endemicity

observation.observationTitle: Travel to country with a Yellow Fever vaccination entry requirement
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who travel to a country with a Yellow Fever vaccination entry requirement.
observation.clarifyingText: A list of country-specific requirements is available at http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2010/chapter-2/yellow-fever-vaccine-requirements-and-recommendations.aspx.

observation.observationTitle: College students living in residence halls
observation.indicationText: Administer to college students living in residence halls.

observation.observationTitle: Resident of area at risk for exposure to the disease
observation.indicationText: Administer to residents of an area at risk for exposure to the disease.
Administer to persons who will be travelling internationally.

observation.observationTitle: Working with Hepatitis A virus in research setting
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who work with Hepatitis A virus in a research setting.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes working with HAV-infected primates or with HAV in a research laboratory setting

observation.observationTitle: Microbiologists routinely exposed to Neisseria meningitidis
observation.indicationText: Administer to microbiologists routinely exposed to isolates of Neisseria meningitidis.

observation.observationTitle: Microbiology laboratorians who work frequently with S. typhi
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are microbiology laboratorians who work frequently with S. typhi.

observation.observationTitle: Laboratory personnel who might be exposed to YFV
observation.indicationText: Administer to laboratory personnel who might be exposed to virulent YFV or to concentrated preparations of YF vaccine virus strains by direct or indirect contact or by aerosols.
Administer to Rabies researchers.

observation.observationTitle: Laboratory workers who handle specimens that might contain polioviruses
observation.indicationText: Administer to laboratory workers who handle specimens that might contain polioviruses.
Administer to healthcare personnel without evidence of immunity.
observation.clarifyingText: A general definition of health care personnel is given in the National Healthcare Safety Network [NHSN] manual [http://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/pdfs/hps-manual/vaccination/hps-flu-vaccine-protocol.pdf] in the denominator definition.

observation.observationTitle: Health-care workers who have close contact with patients who might be excreting wild polioviruses
observation.indicationText: Administer to health-care workers who have close contact with patients who might be excreting wild polioviruses.

observation.observationTitle: Public safety worker exposed to blood or infection body fluids
observation.indicationText: Administer to public safety workers exposed to blood or infection body fluids

observation.observationTitle: Staff of institution for persons with developmental disabilities
observation.indicationText: Administer to staff of institution for persons with developmental disabilities
Administer to persons who have an occupational exposure for Hepatitis A
observation.clarifyingText: Consideration may be given to vaccination of employees who work in areas where state and local health authorities or private employers determine that such vaccination is appropriate.

observation.indicationText: Administer to veterinarians and their staff.
Administer to animal handlers.

observation.observationTitle: Persons whose activities bring them into frequent contact with rabies virus or potentially rabid animals
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons whose activities bring them into frequent contact with rabies virus or potentially rabid animals.
Administer to persons who are students in a postsecondary educational institution.
Administer to military recruits.

observation.observationTitle: Client of institution for persons with developmental disabilities
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are a client of institution for persons with developmental disabilities.
Administer to persons with chronic renal failure.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has chronic renal failure.

observation.observationTitle: In drug abuse treatment and prevention facility
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are in a drug abuse treatment and prevention facility.
Administer to persons who are in a correctional facility.

observation.observationTitle: Persons at risk during an outbreak
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons identified as at increased risk during a community outbreak attributable to a vaccine serogroup.

observation.observationTitle: Household contact with hepatitis B surface antigen-positive persons
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have household contact with hepatitis B surface antigen-positive persons.

observation.observationTitle: Intimate exposure to a documented S. typhi carrier
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have intimate exposure to a documented S. typhi carrier.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., household contact

observation.observationTitle: Household and close contacts of immunocompromised persons
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are household and close contacts of immunocompromised persons.
Administer to persons who are serologically negative for varicella.
Administer to transgender persons.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has progressive neurologic disorder until a treatment regimen has been\nestablished and the condition has stabilized.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes infantile spasms, uncontrolled epilepsy, or progressive encephalopathy for the administration of any pertussis-containing\nvaccine

observation.observationTitle: Received inactivated or unknown measles vaccine between 1963-1967
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who received inactivated or unknown measles vaccine between 1963-1967.

observation.observationTitle: Received killed or unknown Mumps vaccine before 1979
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who received killed or unknown Mumps vaccine before 1979.

observation.observationTitle: Encephalopathy not attributable to another identifiable cause within 7 days of administration of a previous dose of Tdap, DTP, or DTaP vaccine
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had encephalopathy not attributable to another identifiable cause within 7 days of administration of a previous dose of Tdap, DTP, or DTaP vaccine.

codedValue.text: Encephalopathy within 7 days of previous dose of DTP or DTaP

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Polio
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Polio vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Japanese Encephalitis
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Japanese Encephalitis vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by Japanese encephalitis virus vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Rotavirus
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Rotavirus vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Typhoid
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Typhoid vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Influenza
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Influenza vaccine.

codedValue.text: Influenza, split incl. purified surface antigen
Influenza, injectable, quadrivalent, preservative free, peds
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Pertussis
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Pertussis vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Diphtheria
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Diphtheria vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Tetanus
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Tetanus vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Varicella
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Varicella vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by varicella virus live vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of HPV
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of HPV vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction to human papillomavirus vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Measles
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Measles vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Mumps
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Mumps vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Rubella
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Rubella vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Pneumococcal
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Pneumococcal vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Meningococcal
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Meningococcal vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by meningococcal conjugate vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hepatitis A
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hepatitis A vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hepatitis B
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hepatitis B vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hib
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hib vaccine.

codedValue.text: Haemophilus influenzae Type B vaccine adverse reaction [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Yellow Fever
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Yellow Fever vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction to yellow fever vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of live zoster
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of live zoster vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by zoster vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has a history of egg allergy.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to gelatin.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to arginine.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has an allergy to latex.

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to chicken protein
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to chicken protein.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to gentamicin.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to neomycin.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to streptomycin.

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to polymyxin B
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to polymyxin B.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to yeast.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to the preservative 2-phenoxyethanol.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to alum.
observation.clarifyingText: AKA potassium aluminum sulfate

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Rabies
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Rabies vaccine.

codedValue.text: Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have end stage renal disease.
observation.clarifyingText: includes dialysis patients

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to protamine sulfate
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to protamine sulfate.

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Meningococcal B
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Meningococcal B vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by meningococcal group B vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to diphtheria toxoid
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to diphtheria toxoid.

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to tetanus toxoid
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to tetanus toxoid.
observation.clarifyingText: Currently not in use

observation.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of cholera
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of cholera vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by cholera vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are experiencing homelessness.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Tetanus IG administered in the previous 3 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Hepatitis A IG administered in the previous 3 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Hepatitis B IG administered in the previous 3 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Rabies IG administered in the previous 4 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Varicella IG administered in the previous 5 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Measles IG at a standard dose [0.25 mL/kg] administered in the previous 5 months.

observation.observationTitle: Measles prophylaxis IG administration - Immunocompromised Contact
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had Measles IG at an immunocompromised dose [0.5 mL/kg] administered in the previous 6 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received a blood transfusion of adenine-saline added RBCs in the previous 3 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received a blood transfusion of packed RBCs in the previous 6 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received a whole blood transfusion in the previous 6 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received a blood transfusion of plasma or platelet product in the previous 7 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received Cytomegalovirus IGIV in the previous 6 months.

observation.observationTitle: IGIV - Replacement therapy for immune deficiencies
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has received IGIV [Replacement therapy for immune deficiencies] in the previous 8 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received IGIV [Immune thrombocytopenic purpura treatment [400 mg/kg IV]] in the previous 8 months.
observation.clarifyingText: 400 mg/kg IV

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has received IGIV [Postexposure varicella prophylaxis] in the previous 8 months.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has received IGIV [Immune thrombocytopenic purpura treatment [1000 mg/kg IV]] in the previous 10 months.
observation.clarifyingText: 1000 mg/kg IV

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has received IGIV [Kawasaki disease] in the previous 11 months.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to or working in countries that have high or intermediate endemicity of Hepatitis A
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons traveling to or working in countries that have high or intermediate endemicity of Hepatitis A.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to areas or countries where polio is epidemic or endemic
observation.indicationText: Administer to travelers to areas or countries where polio is epidemic or endemic.

observation.observationTitle: International travel with possible contact with animals in areas where rabies is enzootic and immediate access to appropriate medical care might be limited
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons with plans for international travel with possible contact with animals in areas where rabies is enzootic and immediate access to appropriate medical care might be limited.
Administer to persons who have severe B-lymphocyte [humoral] - antibody deficiencies [e.g., X-linked agammaglobulinemia and common variable immunodeficiency].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has severe B-lymphocyte [humoral] - antibody deficiencies [e.g., X-linked agammaglobulinemia and common variable immunodeficiency].
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., X-linked agammaglobulinemia and common variable immunodeficiency

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have less severe B-lymphocyte [humoral] - antibody deficiencies [e.g., selective IgA deficiency and IgG subclass deficiency].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has less severe B-lymphocyte [humoral] - antibody deficiencies [e.g., selective IgA deficiency and IgG subclass deficiency].
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., selective IgA deficiency and IgG subclass deficiency

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have complete cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., severe combined immunodeficiency [SCID] disease, complete DiGeorge syndrome].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has complete cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., severe combined immunodeficiency [SCID] disease, complete DiGeorge syndrome].
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., severe combined immunodeficiency [SCID] disease, complete DiGeorge syndrome

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have partial cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has partial cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia].
observation.clarifyingText: e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia

observation.observationTitle: T-lymphocyte [cell-mediated and humoral] - interferon-gamma/Interleukin 12 axis deficiencies
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have T-lymphocyte [cell-mediated and humoral] - interferon-gamma or interferon-alpha.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate with live attenuated typhoid virus [Ty21a] if the patient has T-lymphocyte [cell-mediated and humoral] - interferon-gamma/Interleukin 12 axis deficiencies.

observation.observationTitle: T-lymphocyte [cell-mediated and humoral] - interferon-gamma or interferon-alpha
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have T-lymphocyte [cell-mediated and humoral] - interferon-gamma or interferon-alpha.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects related to interferon-gamma or interferon-alpha

observation.observationTitle: Persistent complement, properdin, or factor B deficiency
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have persistent complement component deficiencies, including inherited or chronic deficiencies in C3, C5-9, properdin, factor D, factor H, or who are taking eculizumab [Soliris].
Administer to persons who have chronic granulomatous disease.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has phagocytic function - chronic granulomatous disease.

observation.observationTitle: Phagocytic function - Leukocyte adhesion defect, and myeloperoxidase deficiency
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have a phagocytic function defect [e.g. leukocyte adhesion defect and myeloperoxidase deficiency].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has a phagocytic function defect [e.g. leukocyte adhesion defect and myeloperoxidase deficiency].
observation.clarifyingText: Phagocytic deficiencies that are undefined or accompanied by defects in T-cell and NK cell dysfunction (such as a Chediak-Higashi syndrome, Leukocyte Adhesion Deficiency [LAD], and myeloperoxidase deficiency)

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have HIV/AIDS and are severely immunocompromised [See the CDC general recommendations for a definition of "severely immunocompromised"].
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has HIV/AIDS and is severely immunocompromised [See the CDC general recommendations for a definition of "severely immunocompromised"].
observation.clarifyingText: See CDC general recommendations for guidance on defining "severely immunocompromised"

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have HIV/AIDS and are not severely immunocompromised [See the CDC general recommendations for a definition of "severely immunocompromised"].
observation.clarifyingText: See CDC general recommendations for guidance on defining "not severely immunocompromised"

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have generalized malignant neoplasm.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has generalized malignant neoplasm.

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have received a transplant.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient received a transplant.

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are undergoing immunosuppressive therapy. Immunosuppressive medications include those given to prevent solid organ transplant rejection, human immune mediators like interleukins and colony-stimulating factors, immune modulators like levamisol and BCG bladder-tumor therapy, and medicines like tumor necrosis factor alpha inhibitors and anti-B cell antibodies.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is undergoing immunosuppressive therapy. Immunosuppressive medications include those given to prevent solid organ transplant rejection, human immune mediators like interleukins and colony-stimulating factors, immune modulators like levamisol and BCG bladder-tumor therapy, and medicines like tumor necrosis factor alpha inhibitors and anti-B cell antibodies.
observation.clarifyingText: Immunosuppressive medications include those given to prevent solid organ transplant rejection, human immune mediators like interleukins and colony-stimulating factors, immune modulators like levamisol and BCG bladder-tumor therapy, and medicines like tumor necrosis factor alpha inhibitors and anti-B cell antibodies.

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who are undergoing radiation therapy.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is undergoing radiation therapy.

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons with anatomic or functional asplenia, including sickle cell disease.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has anatomical or functional asplenia.
observation.clarifyingText: e.g. Sickle cell disease and other hemoglobinopathies, congenital or acquired asplenia, splenic dysfunction, and splenectomy

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons with chronic renal disease.
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has chronic renal disease.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to areas at risk for Yellow Fever transmission
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who travel to areas at risk for Yellow Fever transmission.
observation.clarifyingText: Given that changes in the designation of endemic regions can occur, travelers and health-care providers should obtain updated information from CDC, available at http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2010/chapter-2/yellow-fever.aspx.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to areas in which there is a recognized risk of exposure to S. typhi
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who travel to areas in which there is a recognized risk of exposure to S. typhi.

observation.observationTitle: Travel to or are residents of countries in which meningococcal disease is hyperendemic or epidemic
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who travel to or are residents of countries in which meningococcal disease is hyperendemic or epidemic.

observation.observationTitle: Longer-term (e.g., 1 month or more) travel to a JE-endemic area
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who plan for longer-term (e.g., 1 month or more) travel to JE-endemic areas.
observation.clarifyingText: Endemic Area and transmission season is determined by country.  Refer to the yellow book for a definition of the transmission season: http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2014/chapter-3-infectious-diseases-related-to-travel/japanese-encephalitis\n

observation.observationTitle: Travel to countries with high or intermediate prevalence of chronic HBV infection
observation.indicationText: Administered to persons who travel to countries with high or intermediate prevalence of chronic HBV infection.
Administer to persons with nephrotic syndrome.

observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is undergoing chemotherapy, including 14 days before the start of therapy and 3 months after the completion of therapy.

observation.observationTitle: History of sexual abuse or assault
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who have a history of sexual abuse or assault.
observation.clarifyingText: Includes children and youth who are suspected or confirmed victims of sexual abuse or assault.

observation.observationTitle: Date of hematopoietic stem cell transplant
Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of recombinant zoster
observation.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of recombinant zoster vaccine.

codedValue.text: Adverse reaction caused by zoster vaccine [disorder]
Allergy to previous dose of this vaccine or to any of its unlisted vaccine components [anaphylactic]

observation.observationTitle: Moving to JE-endemic country to take up residence
observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who plan to move to JE-endemic countries to take up residence.
observation.clarifyingText: Endemic Area and transmission season is determined by country.  Refer to the yellow book for a definition of the transmission season: http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2014/chapter-3-infectious-diseases-related-to-travel/japanese-encephalitis\n

observation.indicationText: Administer to persons who frequently travel to JE-endemic areas.
observation.clarifyingText: Endemic Area and transmission season is determined by country.  Refer to the yellow book for a definition of the transmission season: http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2014/chapter-3-infectious-diseases-related-to-travel/japanese-encephalitis\n
